title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.28 - Public record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.28 - Public record

State Regulations

The record as defined in sections 253. 25 and 253. 26 of
this Part shall constitute the public record of the case and shall be made
available for inspection or copying under such conditions as the board may
prescribe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.28

Renumbered from 253.51

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
